text: Look Who's Talking Too is a comedy and drama movie. It was released December 14, 1990 in the United States. The movie is about childbirth and a couple wanting to be an average family. Kirstie Alley plays Mollie, Roseanne Barr voices Julie, John Travolta plays James and Bruce Willis voices Mikey. The movie received very negative reviews. Its overall box office, however, was moderately strong. == References == == Other websites == * * * * Category:1990 comedy-drama movies Category:1990 romantic comedy movies Category:1990 romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:1990s sequel movies Category:American family movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Movies about children Category:Movies directed by Amy Heckerling Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Pregnancy movies
title: Look Who's Talking Too
